name: Slide Bros
description:
WINTER IS FINALLY HERE! Our bobsleigh is ready to slide! Join us for a ride and let’s see if you will make a great team! TIME IS RUNNING!

Slide Bros is a cooperative 3D game, a race against time. The two players are placed on a bobsleigh that is speeding depending on the trajectory the two players are taking. 

Do your best to avoid obstacles, especially Bob the snowman, we like him!

The game is based on 4 main mechanics : You can move, accelerate, slow down and interact. 

  • Genre : Racing
  • Number of players : 2, coooperative
  • Development time : 1 week
  • Platform : Windows & Mac
